```{r GDP from Portugal, France, Hungary, Slovakia and Denmark}
BNP<- read.csv("nama_10r_3gdp.csv")
BNP <- BNP %>% 
  select(unit, geo, TIME_PERIOD, OBS_VALUE) %>%
      rename(GDP = "OBS_VALUE",Year = "TIME_PERIOD", land = "geo") 
```


```{r navn}
names(BNP)
```

```{r Nytt datasett}
Pop<- read_csv("demo_r_pjanaggr3.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
Pop <- Pop %>% 
  select(geo, TIME_PERIOD, OBS_VALUE) %>%
      rename(Befolkning = "OBS_VALUE",Year_pop = "TIME_PERIOD") 
 
  
```

```{r}
names(Pop)
```

```{r}
 BNP2<- BNP %>%
      select(unit, land,Year, GDP) %>%
      left_join(Pop, by = c("Year" = "Year_pop", "land" = "geo"))
     
```

```{r Calculate GDP per capita}
BNP2 <- BNP2 %>%
mutate(Percapita = GDP / Befolkning) %>%
na.omit()
```

```{r}
summary(BNP2)
```

```{r}
BNP2 %>%
filter(land > DK) %>%
	group_by(land) %>%
	summarise(Percapita = mean(DK))
```
